snippet.title: Little Nemo and the Nightmare Fiends - March 2021 pre-alpha trailer
snippet.description:
NOW LIVE on Kickstarter! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/littlenemogame/little-nemo-and-the-nightmare-fiends

Little Nemo and the Nightmare Fiends is a 2D non-linear platformer with 4 playable characters that players can freely switch between. Each character's unique powers help players explore a huge cartoon world and can be chained for wild amounts of mobility! The game features artwork inspired by the groundbreaking 1905 Little Nemo in Slumberland comic, hand-drawn keyframed animation, and a huge cast of surreal creatures and characters!
